```{r para, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, autodep=TRUE}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)

path2localfile<-"../data/"
species = read_excel(paste0(path2localfile,"dataLOOP.xlsx"))

     
     for (i in 1:nrow(species)) {
  render("ScaleENG.rmd", 
         params=list(spplat=species$spplat[i], sppeng=species$sppeng[i], sex=species$sex[i], sppfr=species$sppfr[i]),
         output_file=paste0("Scale_", species$spplat[i],"_", species$sex[i], ".html"))
}
     
     
```
